positive_examples: This is an example of opening container.
The opening container demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed opening container in this context.
A typical case of opening container would involve these features.
The concept of opening container applies here.
The mechanical motion of accessing the contents of a sealed or closed container.
negative_examples: This is an example of opening eyes, not opening container.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: OpeningEyes, or other types of Opening

definition: The action of removing or displacing a lid or seal to access contents.
